appetizers.name: Beef Haleem
appetizers.desc: Haleem is made of four different kinds of lentils with cube beef and chef special spices.

appetizers.name: Chotpoti
appetizers.desc: A tangy Bengali street food delight featuring tender chickpeas in a spicy, tamarind-infused sauce, topped with crunchy fuchka shells, onions, and fresh coriander.

appetizers.name: Chicken Shingara 2 pc
appetizers.desc: Crispy, golden Bengali pastry with a savory spiced chicken filling, served with tangy tamarind chutney.
